name: Sanrio Carnival
summary: Sanrio Carnival plays in the style of Dr. Mario, but features Hello Kitty and her friends. The player must match block objects of the same type in a horizontal or vertical row of three, four of five. The menu allows the player three different single-player styles of game which determines what goal must be met as well as options to choose a music track and theme of the blocks. There is also a two-player versus mode available.
